Author: Shofiqul
Title: ✅ [ANN] [ICO] CryptoGlobal P2P Cryptocurrency Exchange - 2,000 users in 2 weeks✅
Body: We have gained over 2,000 users within the first week                   CryptoGlobal is a Peer-to-Peer Decentralised Exchange. Based in London.  We make the buying and selling of Bitcoin (and other cryptocurrencies with your help) as easy as possible.  We're instant. P2P. Private. Leveraging Multi-sig Escrow technology.    You can visit our live working exchange here and sign up - www.cryptoglobal.trade  See about Our Project   Problems we're solving?  1. Banking the Unbanked  Two billion adults have no access to traditional banking, meaning they are unable to invest in cryptocurrencies  2. Exchanges Are Complicated Current cryptocurrency exchanges are far too complicated and not practical for everyday users, resulting in high entry barriers.   3. Increasing Problem of Centralisation, Shift to Decentralisation Centralised exchanges are increasingly becoming under-attack and cryptocurrencies are vulnerable to price manipulation.   4. Exchange to Fiat/Cash No easy and efficient way to exchange cryptocurrencies back to cash without delays, risks and high fees.  Our Solution?  A peer-to-peer cryptocurrency digital asset exchange, allowing users to buy, sell and exchange digital assets globally, using over 40 fiat currencies.  1. Buy & Sell digital assets using over 20 payment methods. Giving access and options to the unbanked.  2. A simple, intuitive and clean platform design. Built with a user first approach.  3. Decentralised and peer-to-peer. Putting investors back in control.  4. Easily exchange cryptocurrency to fiat – quickly, effectively and efficiently.  5. Fees of only 0.5%  Unlike many projects, we've put alot of skin in the game and we've built a live platform, we need your help to take it to the next level.  ROADMAP    TOKEN SELL    TOKEN USE CASES    Our Bounty campaign is live: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3105608

Title: ✅ [ANN] [ICO] CryptoGlobal P2P Cryptocurrency Exchange - 2,000 users in 2 weeks✅
Body: As a company, you were registered but as an exchange, not yet. Anyway that's your prerogative. So many exchanges are not legally registered that have been in operation. But with the legal registration, adds credibility and trust to the users.

Author: cryptoglobal-markets
Title: ✅ [ANN] [ICO] CryptoGlobal P2P Cryptocurrency Exchange - 2,000 users in 2 weeks✅
Body: As mentioned above, we have are registered legally and strategically in locations which are enabling cryptocurrency technologies and businesses to flourish, an example being the UK, where our parent company is registered.  The FCA (the UK's version of the SEC) at this time does not require any regsitration nor regulation (at this time) when this changes, we will comply.  We are in the process of securing an e-money licence similar to Coinbase's recent award.   "UK’s Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) has remained officially silent on regulation of cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and the financial services and activities related to them."   See this link for mroe --> https://www.forexbrokerz.com/page/uk-cryptocurrency-exchanges
